content: > a free version of this pattern is > available on my website as a two-part > photo tutorial the paid-for version > includes a written-only us pdf and a > photo tutorial us pdf both versions contain charts **update 31 december 2023** **please note ** i have now extended this pattern to fit a 85cm/33 5 hoop you can find the extended version here 1 it is made with scheepjes whirl and the pattern is available for free or as a paid pdf ************************************************* during these last few months i have thought a lot about the hidden unseen things people go through some of them temporary and some of them life-long battles regardless of the extent/seriousness/duration hidden things carry a burden very different from that of visible things and if they are hidden even from ourselves whether that is simply because we don t have names for them yet or because we do not want to acknowledge them that burden becomes even heavier i designed this mandala to acknowledge the hidden and unseen both in others and in ourselves the colours have been inspired by a rainbow zebra infographic for ehlers danlos syndrome **details** this mandala is a 29-round mandala designed to be stretched on a hoop and used as a wall hanging the pattern contains bobble stitches popcorn stitches puff stitches and front post/back post stitches although it is an intermediate pattern it has been written for adventurous beginners with plenty of photos and hints enjoy dedri 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/extended-unseen-mandala
